ad_text: Brownwood Nursing and Rehab Sponsored ** $2500 Sign-On Bonus- LVN ** ** $3500 Sign-On Bonus- RN ** Brownwood Nursing and Rehab is looking for passionate nurses to join our clinical team. Sign-on bonuses are valid until 01/31/2023. Apply on Facebook by visiting our page or stop by in person and fill out an application. We are located at 101 Miller Dr. Brownwood, TX 76801. For all questions, please contact Kayla Torrez at 325-643-9555 . FULL-TIME · BROWNWOOD, TEXAS Charge Nurse Apply now
